description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application named notesbackend. It provides basic endpoints including a welcome message, a link to API docs, a health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints such as welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Generates a redirect to the Swagger UI page based on the original request URL.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns a string with application information, specifically noting 'notesbackend'.
